channel.title: How to add voting on rsps?
channel.description: Does anyone know how to add voting to my rsps? The source is Rune Evo v3. I need to know how to make it for my website also! My skype is zammykill if you wanna talk easier.

item.title: How to add voting on rsps?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This section is for asking for help with issues you’ve encountered while developing your server, not asking people to spoonfeed and do things for you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add voting on rsps?

item.title: How to add voting on rsps?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

There are many tutorials, even on these forums. Just search “Vote4Cash” or “RSPS automatic donations” you can find a tutorial for pretty much any revision. The program they’re going to use is probably GTLVote, it’s just a process of setting it up on your server, setting up voting links on the site, and getting the SQL database to work with the server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add voting on rsps?
